name: 真乃
text: おはようございます
trans: Good morning.

name: 灯織
text:
おはよう
めぐる、早いね
trans:
Morning.
You're pretty early, Meguru.

name: めぐる
text:
あ、おはよー！
今日は助っ人の試合が早く終わったんだ！
trans:
Ah, Morning!
Our scrimmage with another team finished early!

name: 灯織
text:
……どうしたの？
いつもより楽しそう
trans:
...Did something happen?
You seem a lot happier than usual.

name: めぐる
text:
えっとね、実は……
じゃーん！　見て見て！
trans:
Weell, Actually...
Tada～! Look at this!

name: 真乃
text: 旅行の……パンフレット？
trans: A traveling... pamphlet?

name: めぐる
text:
そう！　事務所に来る途中でもらったんだ
綺麗な写真がたくさん載ってるんだよ
trans:
Yep! Someone gave it to me on the way here.
There's so many pretty photos in it!

name: めぐる
text: ほらっ、これとか……あとこれも！
trans: Look! Like this one... and this one!

name: 灯織
text: 本当だ……
trans: You're right...

name: めぐる
text:
ね、ね、ふたりも一緒に見よう？
わたし、他にも見せたい写真があって──
trans:
Hey, do you two want to look at it together?
There's a ton of other photos I want to show──

name: めぐる
text:
このおっきい門とか、美術館とか！
真乃と灯織と行ってみたいなーって考えてたの！
trans:
Like this huuge gate, and this really cool museum!
It would be fun if we could visit them together!

name: 灯織
text: 確かに、歴史に触れるのって勉強になりそう
trans:
Indeed, visiting places with deep history
seems like a good learning experience.

name: 真乃
text: ふふ、灯織ちゃんらしいね
trans: Fufu, that's very like you to say, Hiori-chan.

name: 灯織
text: 真乃はどこか行きたいところある？
trans:
Is there some sort of place you would like to
visit, Mano?

name: 真乃
text:
えっと……
この写真みたいな広い原っぱでお昼寝してみたいな
trans:
Umm...
I'd like to take an afternoon nap in an open
field, like the one in this photo here.

name: めぐる
text: わぁ、それも良いね！
trans: Woah! That sounds fun too!

name: 灯織
text: それだと、山とか？
trans: In that case, maybe the mountain might work?

name: 真乃
text: ほわぁ……一緒に山登りするのも良いなぁ
trans:
Howa...
And climbing a mountain together sounds fun, too.

name: めぐる
text:
あっ、待って待って！　わたし海行きたい！
みんなでビーチバレーしたら絶対楽しいよ！
trans:
Oh, wait, wait! I want to go to the ocean!
It'd be a blast playing beach volleyball together!

name: 真乃
text:
ふふっ
めぐるちゃんと一緒にビーチバレーしたら楽しそうっ
trans:
Fufu.
Playing beach volleyball with you does sound fun.

name: 灯織
text:
……楽しそうだけど
３人でどうやってビーチバレーするの？
trans:
...It does, but...
How are we going to play with only 3 people?

name: めぐる
text: パスとかトスとかでも充分楽しいよ！
trans:
We can just pass the ball around and stuff,
that's still plenty of fun!

name: めぐる
text: ねえ、灯織は？　灯織は、どこに行きたいの？
trans:
Hey, how about you, Hiori?
Is there anywhere you want to go?

name: 灯織
text:
私？　うーん……海外とかは行ってみたいかな
普段できない体験ができそうだし
trans:
Me? Hmm... I'd like to go overseas, maybe.
I'd be able to experience things I normally can't.

name: 灯織
text:
……そうじゃなかったら、後は……
普段見られない、綺麗な景色を見たりとか……
trans:
...If not oversees, then...
Anywhere that's a change of pace, perhaps with
beautiful scenery and such...

name: めぐる
text: 灯織っ、それなら良いところがあるよ！
trans: In that case, I got just the place for you, Hiori～!

name: 灯織
text: ちょ、ちょっといきなりくっつかないでよ……
trans: H-Hey, don't cling to me all of a sudden...

name: めぐる
text:
綺麗な景色と、自然でしょー……？
確かこっちに……あった！　これこれ！
trans:
A beautiful view, filled with nature, right...?
I think it's riight... here! This one!

name: めぐる
text:
自然の中で、川とか星とかを見るの！
どうかなっ？
trans:
It's right in the middle of nature with a great
view of the river, and you can see stars too!
How does that sound?

name: 真乃
text: 緑がいっぱいで、気持ちよさそうだねっ
trans:
There's so much greenery...
It seems really refreshing!

name: 灯織
text: 確かに、良い場所だね……
trans: It does look like a wonderful place...

name: めぐる
text: こういうところでのんびりするのも楽しそうだよね？
trans:
It's the perfect place to sit back and
relax at, isn't it?

name: 真乃
text:
うんっ
きっとすごく楽しいと思うなぁ
trans:
Yep!
I think that would be really fun...

name: 真乃
text: 灯織ちゃん？
trans: Hiori-chan?

name: 灯織
text:
……あ、ごめん
この写真、すごい綺麗で……
trans:
...Ah, sorry.
It's just that this picture is really pretty...

name: 真乃
text:
ううん。でも、灯織ちゃんが見入っちゃうのもわかるよ
映画とか……空想の場所みたいだもんね……
trans:
It's fine. It really is a mesmerizing photo, right?
It looks like a scene from a movie... or even a dream...

name: めぐる
text:
……ね、みんなでこういうところに行こうよ！
わたしたちで、旅行をするの！
trans:
...Hey, let's all go to a place like this!
We can go on a trip!

name: 真乃
text:
ほわぁ……
みんなで旅行……楽しそうだね
trans:
Howa...
A trip together... That sounds really fun!

name: 真乃
text: で、でも、行けるのかな……？
trans: B-But, could we...?

name: 灯織
text:
レッスンとか仕事のスケジュールもあるし……
……難しそうだよね
trans:
We do have lessons and jobs scheduled...
...It seems difficult to plan.

name: めぐる
text:
うーん……
そっかぁ、難しいかぁ……
trans:
Ahhh...
Yeah, you're right...

name: 真乃
text:
今は、アイドルとして頑張らなきゃ、だもんね
……でも、いつかみんなで行けたら良いなって思うな
trans:
Right now, we're all working hard as idols,
after all... But I'd love to travel someday.

name: 灯織
text: そうだね。私も綺麗な景色……見たいかな
trans:
I agree. I also want to visit...
a beautiful place like this.

name: めぐる
text: ……うん！
trans: ...Yep!

name: めぐる
text:
（ふたりとも、行きたいって思ってくれてるなら……
なんとかできると良いんだけどなぁ……！）
trans:
(If both of them want to go that much...
I want to make it happen, somehow...!)
